name: dental cleanings
description: cleaning teeth and gums to prevent cavities and gum disease and bad breath and tooth loss and other dental problems and diseases

name: x-rays of teeth
description: x-rays of teeth and gums to detect cavities and gum disease and tooth loss and other dental problems and diseases

name: fillings
description: filling cavities in teeth to prevent tooth loss and other dental problems and diseases

name: root canals
description: removing infected pulp from inside teeth to prevent tooth loss and other dental problems and diseases

name: crowns
description: covering damaged teeth with caps to prevent tooth loss and other dental problems and diseases

name: dentures
description: replacing missing teeth with artificial teeth to prevent tooth loss and other dental problems and diseases
